widget.name: Telerik.UI.RadPagination
widget.title: RadPagination
widget.description: A navigation control that tracks the current position within a pageable container like WinJS.UI.FlipView.

property.name: pageProvider
property.description: Gets or sets the page provider control that RadPagination will navigate.

property.name: thumbnails
property.description: Gets the thumbnails list for this control.

property.name: label
property.description: Gets the thumbnails list for this control.

property.name: itemTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets the template used for rendering thumbnail items. Accepts any of: WinJS.BindingTemplate instance or an HTML element hosting a template; a function returning an HTML string or a DOM element; an HTML string with binding expressions defining the template.

property.name: showButtons
property.description: Indicates whether the control displays previous and next buttons for navigation.

property.name: showThumbnails
property.description: Indicates whether the control displays thumbnails for navigation.

property.name: showLabel
property.description: Indicates whether the control displays a label.

property.name: enabled
property.description: Gets or sets the enabled state of the control.

property.name: currentIndex
property.description: Gets or sets the index of the currently selected item.

property.name: element
property.description: Gets the DOM element that hosts this control.

property.name: initialized
property.description: Indicates whether the control is initialized.
